suite.name: getRequest

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://restapi.demoqa.com, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Get Request
kw.doc: Send a GET request on the session object found using the given `alias`
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://restapi.demoqa.com/utilities/weather/city/Delhi path_url=/utilities/weather/city/Delhi headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.23.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://restapi.demoqa.com/utilities/weather/city/Delhi status=200, reason=OK body={ "City": "Delhi", "Temperature": "38 Degree celsius", "Humidity": "35 Percent", "WeatherDescription": "haze", "WindSpeed": "2.6 Km per hour", "WindDirectionDegree": "50 Degree" }

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.
kw.msg: ${body} = { "City": "Delhi", "Temperature": "38 Degree celsius", "Humidity": "35 Percent", "WeatherDescription": "haze", "WindSpeed": "2.6 Km per hour", "WindDirectionDegree": "50 Degree...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.
